#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;


int main() {
int n,coin,max=0,denom;
map<int,int> mp;
	cin>>n;
	while(n--)
	{	
		cin >> coin;
		mp[coin]++;
		if(mp[coin]>max)
		{
			max = mp[coin];
			denom = coin;
		}
		else if(mp[coin] == max && coin < denom)
		{
			max = mp[coin];
			denom=coin;
		}

	}
	cout << denom << "\n";
	cout << max << "\n";

	return 0;
}
